Package it.polimi.ingsw.controller.server.welcome_server

Class Server

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.controller.server.welcome_server.Server
All Implemented Interfaces:
Service, Runnable
Direct Known Subclasses:
ConcreteServer
public abstract class Server extends Object implements Runnable, Service
The server consists of: - a serverSocket to establish connections with the clients - a hub -called limbo- where all clients who aren't currently engaged are - a collection of the currently loaded lobbies

    • addNewLobby

      public String addNewLobby(int numberOfPlayers, TypeOfGame gameMode) throws InvalidArgsException
      creates a new lobby in a no game state and adds it to its collection
      Parameters:
      numberOfPlayers - desired number of players
      gameMode - desired game mode
      Returns:
      id of the created lobby
      Throws:
      InvalidArgsException - throw if the given args are invalid: i.e., the number of desired players is none of the following: 2, 3 or 4

    • addToLobby

      public void addToLobby(String gameId, Connection sender) throws ServerException
      tries to add player to lobby
      Parameters:
      gameId - id of the lobby the player wants to join
      sender - player who wants to join
      Throws:
      ServerException - thrown when: - the lobby is in a game state - player tries to log with a name that is currently in use
